item.title: Did COVID-19 Help Trump Win In The 2024 Elections? Probably.
item.description: As a non-American observing Americaâ€™s enthusiastic self-destructing, I find it utterly baffling that a man like Donald Trump could secure a second term. Over half the nation saw the individual who somehow achieved the rare feat of bankrupting not one but two casinos, which are famously designed to print money, as the best choice to lead the country. There’s definitely something wrong with America right?
